Package Project2

Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Project2.Employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fulltime, Parttime
public class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents an employee at a company. It includes fields for the employee's profile, their salary information, and their current payment. This is the parent class for Parttime, Fulltime, and Management classes.
Author:
Srija Gottiparthi, Catherine Nguyen

    Modifier and Type Field Description

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Employee​(Profile employeeProfile)
    Initializes a new Employee object with a given profile and a default salary and payment of 0.
    Employee​(Profile employeeProfile, double salary)
    Initializes a new Employee object with a given profile, given salary, and default payment of 0.

      public void calculatePayment()

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Compares current Employee object to another Employee object. Determines equality by checking if the two employees have identical profiles.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the Employee to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the two Employees' profiles are identical, false otherwise
